news.title: Police accused of 'homophobic assumptions' over victims of blackmail on Grindr
news.summary: A BBC investigation learns of five cases of suspected blackmail involving victims targeted on Grindr in one area.

news.title: Streeting orders review into mental health and ADHD diagnosis
news.summary: The health secretary said the aim was to tackle a rising demand for services and the increased pressure on the NHS.

news.title: Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says
news.summary: US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday.

news.title: Investigation into pre-Budget leaks is under way, MPs told
news.summary: Chancellor Rachel Reeves has given her "full support" to  a review of security processes around the lead-up to the Budget.

news.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
news.summary: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

news.title: Eurovision faces crucial decision over Israel
news.summary: Organisers of the song contest meet in Geneva on Thursday to debate Israel's role in the event.

news.title: Patients clogging A&E with hiccups, sore throats and other niggles
news.summary: NHS bosses warn the public to use hospitals wisely amid concern this could be a tough winter.

news.title: Earthquake shakes homes in north-west England
news.summary: Lancashire residents say the 3.3-magnitude tremor felt like "an underground explosion", but there are no reports of damage.

news.title: Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released
news.summary: The new images come as a deadline for the broader release of documents held by the US government looms.

news.title: New mayoral elections to be delayed in four areas of England
news.summary: The new mayoralties in Greater Essex, Norfolk and Suffolk, Hampshire and the Solent, and Sussex and Brighton will now be contested in 2028.
